Summary: Silver with black underbody and oval windows.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Muskegon
There were no other sightings in Muskegon on or around August 24th 1990
divs: Sighting DetailsThe Ufo was about 100 feet up and about 3 pine trees away it floated there about 3 min and went up and was gone, I was over in E River road suberbs, with a friend named Zimmerman David can't remember the road but soon as you pull onto E river the first rd to the right and at time it was unpaved rds because new suberb, we went out to smoke a cigerrette because I was staying night and waiting for my girlfriend at the time, I never told anyone and niether has he, scared, eccited, and did not want them to take us,It took off on it's own.
